message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I hope you'll see the value in getting a good head start.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. This is a much fairer split.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I think this offer is more fair to both of us, given the changing value of the money. Let's find a solution we can both agree on.
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
